message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
I'll take a bigger share, but it's still a good deal for you too!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve the majority!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small consolation prize!
I'll take almost all the money, but I'll let you keep a tiny bit!
I'll give up, you win! Congratulations!
